descriptionHtml:
[b][center][size=5] Critical Perks Redone [/b][/center][/size]

==========
[[b][size=2]Description[/size][/b]]

* [size=3][b] Have you ever wonder that you can\'t do critical ? even if you max your perks?
 This mod fixes that. Changing the original value into a Awesome Value :D[/b][/size]

* I don\'t know if there is an mod like mine 

 * This fix the critical hit chance and critical damage on perks in Archery , 
One-Handed and Two-Handed..

* Currently Available is [u]One-Handed[/u],
 
[[b][size=2]Changes[/size][/b]]

* Scuffle - Attacks with one-handed weapons deals 2 times of critical damage
-Requires: Armsman And 75 One-Handed-

* Strife - Attacks with daggers have a chance of doing critical damage.
** 1  - 10% Crit Chance -requires 30 one-handed-
** 2  - 25% Crit Chance -requires 60 one-handed-
** 3  - 40% Crit Chance -requires 90 one-handed-
-Requires: Armsman-

* Scrimmage - Attacks with daggers ignore 65% of armor.
-requires: Armsman , Strife and One-handed 100-

* Dispute - Attacks with axes and maces have a 30% chance of doing critical damage
-Requires: Bone breaker , Hack And Slash , Armsman and One-Handed 95-

* Clash - Attacks with swords ignore 55% of armor.
-Requires: Blades Man , Armsman and One-Handed 100-

* Scuffle - Attacks with one-handed weapons deals 2 times of critical damage
-Requires Armsman and One-Handed 75-

* More Perks comin !

[[b][size=2]Compatible[/b][/size]]

* This mod isn\'t compatible which changing the crits on Perks

[[b][size=2]Installation[/b][/size]]

* For NMM users just click Activate then play !.

* For Manual Users :
 Move Critical Redone.esp to your Skyrim Data Folder

[[b][size=2]Bugs[/b][/size]]

* For now None yet :D

[[b][size=3]Version[/b][/size]]

* [u]Version 1[/u]: Initial Release
